type: match on quasi identifiers specific individual
remedy: suppress qausi identifiers in small cells (k-anonymity)

type: match on quasi identifiers specific group
disclosure: sensitive values if are homogeneous in group
remedy: aggregate so that groups are large enough to be heterogeneous (l-diversity)

type: match on quasi identifiers arbitrary individual/group
exclude matches using complete data from another source, perform attack on remaining
remedy: perform anonymization on a conservatively selected, released subset; prevent complement from adding risk

type: exclude matches using offense code from another source, perform attack on remaining
remedy: guarantee diversity in quasi identifiers after stratifying on offense codes
